amendatorysection.para: The return day of the order of attachment, when issued at the commencement of the action, shall be the same as that of the summons; when issued afterwards, it shall be twenty days after it issued.

annotation.para: Action commenced when petition is filed and summons issued is bona fide. Coffman v. Brandhoeffer, 33 Neb. 279, 50 N.W. 6 (1891).
